main

Class Odometer

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • main.Odometer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class Odometer
extends java.lang.Thread
    This object keeps track of how much the robot has moved by measuring the tacho count of its motors. It extends thread so that it can run throughout all the movements and operations of the robot to keep the position information updated.
    Author:
    Niloofar Khoshsiyar

        Returns:

      • run

        public void run()
        Runs the odometer thread. Updates the position parameters based on the readings of the tacho counter of the motors.
        Specified by:
        run in interface java.lang.Runnable
